name: Peel-Out: 2033
description:
Psuedo 3D racing game inspired by "Hang On" based on ideas from  http://www.extentofthejam.com/pseudo/ and https://codeincomplete.com/posts/javascript-racer-v1-straight/

features the song "See You on the Other Side." Dedicated to my father who recently passed on to that big 80s motorcycle race in the sky.

Arrow keys to steer/accelerate/brake.
